front.title: LH-DMHA -Last Hop DMHA(Dormant Mode Host Alerting) Protocol

abstract.t: This document specifies a protocol for alerting a dormant mode hostof incoming packets. A unique characteristic of the proposedprotocol is that its major operations, namely, paging registration,monitoring and capturing of paging triggering packets, and initiationof the paging operation, are performed primarily in a last-hop subnet(i.e., the edge subnet to which the host is connected before enteringdormant mode). The proposed protocol conforms with the DMHA (DormantMode Host Alerting) protocol requirements discussed in the IETFSeamoby WG.
